about_the_game:
Description

Poly Speed is a Low Poly racing game with an open world. You can play races against AI's or against your friends or other Players in online mode. Or you can just try to get the World Record in one of the races. You can also build your own races and play them with your friends or finde some made by other players on the Steam Workshop.

Features

  • Play against your Friends or others in online Multiplayer
  • Get the World record for being the fastes to finish a race
  • Unlock new cars tune and upgrade them to be even faster
  • Level editor with Steam Workshop so you can build you own levels and play them in online mode

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: Dual-core 2 GHz processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or low-end graphics card
  • Storage: 600 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10, 11
  • Processor: Quad-core 3 GHz processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Mid-range or higher graphics card with 2 or more GB VRAM
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
